SEARCH
模块 Tic_tac_toe
程序包 game

类 GlobalMessages

java.lang.Object
game.GlobalMessages
public class GlobalMessages extends Object
The GlobalMessages class contains global variables used across the Tic Tac Toe game application. It maintains the player's name, game statistics, and the current state of the game.
